I wouldn't blame anyone for assuming I actually look like this

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541536e66368721ee1ed0000#post_541536e66368721ee1ed0000
What I mean is more that you need to have enough respect for yourself to not be afraid of being shot down. You need to be willing to approach those you are attracted to with honesty about yourself and what you want, be that a one night stand or a committed relationship. The worst that can happen is they'll tell you to fuck off, and really is that so terrible?

People aren't monsters. They have the same hopes, fears and lusts as you and recognizing this and acting on the fact is to me at least hot as hell.

Also, you aren't the damn Elephant Man, and I know for a fact that there are people, both male and female, who would give their left leg to fuck him.

There is no such thing as unfuckable, you just have to be willing to get out there and talk to people.
